all creatures get minus n minus n until end of turn
all nonsnow creatures get minus x minus x until end of turn where x is the number of snow permanents you control
all creatures get plus x minus x until end of turn
all creatures get minus x minus x until end of turn
all creatures get minus x minus x until end of turn where x is the sacrificed creature's power
attacking creatures get minus n minus n until end of turn
n all creatures get minus n minus n until end of turn
nonartifact creatures get minus n minus n until end of turn
nonblack creatures get minus n minus n until end of turn
nonwhite creatures get minus n minus n until end of turn
target creature gets minus x minus x until end of turn
target creature gets plus x plus x until end of turn where x is the number of lands you control
target creature gets minus x minus x until end of turn where x is the number of cards in your hand
target creature gets minus x minus x until end of turn where x is the number of cards in your graveyard
target creature gets minus x minus x until end of turn where x is the number of zombies on the battlefield
